title: Insanely Adorable Photos of Kate and Prince William Playing With Puppies
text:
After thunderstorms yesterday forced Prince William and Kate Middleton's plane to turn around, the royals successfully touched down in Islamabad this morning. (The whole thing apparently added unexpected excitement to the trip. "I think it was quite an adventure really, it was pretty bumpy up there," Kate said, per royal reporter Rebecca English.)

That meant that the Duke and Duchess were able to attend their cutest engagement of the Pakistani royal tour: a visit to the Army Canine Centre, where dogs are trained to detect explosive devices. The unit, which works in partnership with the UK, does crucial work. And during their visit, the royal couple managed to balance that message with a few priceless photo opps.

Here, the best images from Kate and William's stop at the Army Canine Centre.
